glsa.title: LibXfont, TightVNC: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been reported in libXfont and TightVNC, allowing for the execution of arbitrary code with root privileges.

background.p: LibXfont is the X.Org font library. TightVNC is a VNC client/server for X displays.

description.p: The libXfont code is prone to several integer overflows, in functions ProcXCMiscGetXIDList(), bdfReadCharacters() and FontFileInitTable(). TightVNC contains a local copy of this code and is also affected.

impact.p: A local attacker could use a specially crafted BDF Font to gain root privileges on the vulnerable host.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
